DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two physiotherapy technique : chest wall compression versus chest wall compression plus increase 10 cmH2O inspiratory pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Pressure Support During Chest Wall Compression
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . After place supine position bed , head angle elevation 30° , patient randomize : group 1 ( G1 ) : chest wall compression ten minute chest group 2 ( G2 ) : chest wall compression plus increase 10 cmH2O IP PSV ten minute chest . 2 . Clinical variable APACHE II register . 3 . Parameters analyze begin ( 1 ) end ( 2 ) protocol : variation peak pressure ( ΔPp=Pp2-Pp1 ) , variation tidal volume ( ΔVT =VT2-VT1 ) , variation dynamic compliance ( ΔCdyn= Cdyn2-Cdyn1 ) . 4 . The amount variation mucus secretion aspirate ( ΔSa= Sa2-Sa1 ) end also measure
DOC.criteria: Patients mechanical ventilation 48 hour With ventilatory drive Hemodynamically stable MAP > 60 mmHg With treatment respiratory therapy Contra indication increase positive inspiratory pressure Peak pressure upper airway > 40 cmH2O Osteoporosis diagnosis Deny participate study
